question: US Open: Diane Parry vs Marta Kostyuk

question: Will Donald Trump make an appearance today?
description:
This market will resolve to "Yes" if US President Donald Trump makes a new public or digital appearance between August 30, 5:00 AM ET, and August 30, 2025, 11:59 PM ET. Otherwise, this market will resolve to "No".

A public appearance includes for example Trump descending the steps from Air Force One, or an appearance at a press conference. A digital appearance must be verified as new, authentic footage (not AI-generated). For example, if Trump appears in a new prerecorded speech, this market will resolve to "Yes".

Trump must be awake for this market to resolve to "Yes".

The resolution source for this market will be a consensus of credible reporting.
